text: The Hass avocado is a cultivar of avocado (Persea americana) with dark green colored, bumpy skin. Stradley is a well-known culinary author. It was first grown and sold by Southern California mail carrier and amateur horticulturist Rudolph Hass, who also gave it his name. The Hass avocado is a big fruit weighing 200 to 300 grams. == References == Category:Avocados
title: Hass avocado
